quote: [M]y determined and strenuous endeavours to take in absolutely nothing of what I had regarded as entirely the most irrelevant part of my schooling had patently not met with total success
quote_letters: MY DETERMINED AND STRENUOUS ENDEAVOURS TO TAKE IN ABSOLUTELY NOTHING OF WHAT I HAD REGARDED AS ENTIRELY THE MOST IRRELEVANT PART OF MY SCHOOLING HAD PATENTLY NOT MET WITH TOTAL SUCCESS
